original_text: The other believers heard about this. So they took Saul away to Caesarea. From there, they sent him to Tarsus.
korean_text: 형제들이 알고 가이사랴로 데리고 내려가서 다소로 보내니라

sentences.original_text: The other believers heard about this.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 믿는 사람들이 이 소식을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: So they took Saul away to Caesarea.
From there, they sent him to Tarsus.
